sentences.en: As you hurl the rock, the canoe moves forward.
sentences.cn: 当你扔石块时, 小船会向前游动.

sentences.en: Businessmen will hurl their money about to get noticed.
sentences.cn: 商人愿意挥霍钱财来引起注意.

sentences.en: Demonstrators were hurling bricks through the windows.
sentences.cn: 示威者在向窗里掷砖块。

sentences.en: He hurled a chair across the set, smashing lamps and vases.
sentences.cn: 他抓起一把椅子扔向片场的那头，把灯和花瓶都砸得粉碎。

sentences.en: How frightful to hurl the remaining manhood of France against this wall of fire and concrete!
sentences.cn: 如果将剩下的法国壮丁,派去攻打这座由炮火和混凝土合成的铜墙铁壁,这是多么可怕啊!

sentences.en: How would you handle being locked in the back of a cab while the driver hurled abuse at you?
sentences.cn: 如果你被锁在出租车后座又遭司机谩骂，你会怎么办？

sentences.en: I'll hurl him out of the club if he dare tell the secret!
sentences.cn: 如果他胆敢泄密,我就要把他赶出俱乐部.

sentences.en: I'll hurl you out of the company if you dare say the secret!
sentences.cn: 如果你敢把这个秘密说出去,我就会把你逐出公司.

sentences.en: It is seizeby the throat, to hurl it to the earth.
sentences.cn: 要扼住鬼影的咽喉, 把它制伏在地上,那是不的事.

sentences.en: It took only one heave to hurl him into the river.
sentences.cn: 只一推，就把他推进了河里。

sentences.en: She encouraged the hospitable impulse and promised in advance to hurl herself into the fray.
sentences.cn: 她赞赏这种殷勤好客的热诚,而且先行表示,她一定要痛痛快快玩一下.

sentences.en: She wanted to hurl herself into his arms.
The best cure for unhappiness is to hurl yourself into your work.
sentences.cn: 医治愁苦的最好办法就是全身心地投入工作.

sentences.en: The club leader was dismissed for trying to hurl his weight about, which the young people refused to accept.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部的领导被赶下台了，因为他总是滥用自己的权力，而年轻人却不吃那一套。

sentences.en: The club leader was dismissed for trying to hurl his weight around , which the young people refused to accept.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部的领导被赶下台了,因为他总是滥用自己的权力, 而年轻人却不吃那一套.

sentences.en: The young track and field athlete could already hurl the discus 60 yards.
sentences.cn: 这个年轻的田径运动员已能把铁饼投掷60码远.

sentences.en: To hurl abuse is no way to fight.
When you get to the top, hurl the rope down, will you ?
sentences.cn: 你到了顶上把绳子扔下来好 吗 ?

trans.tran_cn: 猛投，用力投掷，大声说出（辱骂或斥责等）
trans.tran_en: to throw something with a lot of force, especially because you are angry

trans.tran_cn: 猛投， 狠掷； 大声叫骂
